definition: traditional Chinese medicine/TCM
to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
within/among/in/middle/center/while (doing sth)/during/(dialect) OK/all right
China/Chinese/surname Zhong
medical/medicine/doctor/to cure/to treat

Anhui College of Traditional Chinese Medicine
pinyin: An1 hui1 Zhong1 yi1 Xue2 yuan4

sentences.english: Shanxi College graduate, deputy chief physician.
sentences.chinese: 山西中医学院毕业，副主任医师。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, the main methods of preserving health is summed up.
sentences.chinese: 归纳了中医学健康状态调摄的主要方式。

sentences.english: According to Chinese medicine, the walnut is sweet, natured and non-toxic.
sentences.chinese: 中医学认为，腰果味甘，性平，无毒。

sentences.english: Therefore, the Zhouyi's way of thinking has naturally become the basis for Chinese medicine.
sentences.chinese: 《周易》的思维模式也顺理成章地成为中医学的基础。

sentences.english: Taoism and Chinese Medicine are two great treasures of Chinese original culture.
sentences.chinese: 道教与中医学是中华本土文化的两大瑰宝。

sentences.english: Foot massage goes back to ancient times. It's a gem of the treasure-house of the traditional Chinese medical science.
sentences.chinese: 足部按摩源远流长，为中国传统中医学宝库中的瑰宝。

sentences.english: "Du" is a special conception of TCM.
sentences.chinese: “毒”是中医学的一个特殊概念。

sentences.english: TCM believes that the human body is an organic whole.
sentences.chinese: 中医学认为人体是一个有机的整体。

sentences.english: The theoretic system of traditional Chinese medicine is characterized by the concept of organic wholeness and treatment based on syndrome differentiation.
sentences.chinese: 中医学理论体系的基本特点是整体观和辨证论治。

sentences.english: The theory of Mingmen (Life-Gate) has further enriched the doctrine of Viscera and Their Manifestations in traditional Chinese Medicine.
sentences.chinese: 命门学说为中医学的藏象学说增加了新的内容。

sentences.english: Postdoctoral stations have been sep up in all of the 3 first-class subjects of TCM in the Academy.
sentences.chinese: 博士后站已经构建在所有的三个一流学科对中医学院。

sentences.english: The insomnia is clinical frequently encountered disease. Its belong to Chinese medical sleeplessness.
sentences.chinese: 失眠症是临床多发病，属于中医学“不寐”范畴。

sentences.english: In CTM theory, Yin and Yang are used to explain physiological and pathological phenomena of the body.
sentences.chinese: 中医学运用阴阳理论来解释人体的生理和病理现象。

sentences.english: Acupuncture is an important part of traditional Chinese medicine (TCM).
sentences.chinese: 针灸是中医学的重要组成部分。

sentences.english: There are bisexual persons in traditional Chinese medicine.
sentences.chinese: 中国中医学上就有阴阳人这种说法。

sentences.english: Stroke and the phlegm-heat syndrome are hot fields in traditional Chinese medicine research recent years.
sentences.chinese: 中风病和痰热证都是近些年中医学研究的热点问题。

holistic diagnosis and treatment (TCM)

Western medicine/a doctor trained in Western medicine

interpretation of the cause/onset and process of an illness/pathogenesis
"eight principles," a method of giving a general description and syndrome differentiation (TCM)
medicine/medical science/study of medicine
localized pain disorder (in Chinese medicine)/arthralgia syndrome/bi disorder
Compendium of Medical Herbs 1596, compiled by Li Shizhen 李時珍|李时珍[Li3 Shi2 zhen1]
medical science
to investigate
Shennong's Compendium of Materia Medica, a Han dynasty pharmacological compendium, 3 scrolls
prescription/recipe (Chinese medicine)
